message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a unique asset. My initial offer is $1,200,001, which I think is a fair price considering its value to you.
Hello Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but the price is a little high for me. I'd be willing to pay $1,000,000 for it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid $1,000,000 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so my counteroffer is $1,200,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you.
